name: Hammer And Tongs
description:
Mine, Smelt, Smith and Sell your way to getting better. This is a small proof of concept developed over the month of September 2022 for the MinMaxx game jam. Systems may be implemented into a game in the future. Hope you enjoy it! check me out at twitter.com/Lemonlimebitta and one day you may see me publish things a little more robust!

Credits 

Programming : Damon vizl 

Music: Damon vizl

Art: various assets
